mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cabinet_name AS "cabinetName", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.area AS "area", a.address AS "address", a.cabinet_status AS "cabinetStatus", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.cabinet_no AS "cabinetNo"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a3 ON a3.id = a.province LEFT JOIN sys_area a4 ON a4.id = a.city LEFT JOIN sys_area a5 ON a5.id = a.area
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cabinet( id, cabinet_name, province, city, area, address, cabinet_status, create_time, cabinet_no ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{cabinetName}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{address}, #{cabinetStatus}, #{createTime}, #{cabinetNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cabinet SET cabinet_name = #{cabinetName}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, area = #{area}, address = #{address}, cabinet_status = #{cabinetStatus}, create_time = #{createTime}, cabinet_no = #{cabinetNo} WHERE id = #{id}
